p.s: In his opening ceremony at COP26 in Glasgow on 1 November 2021, the britishBritish Prime Minister Boris Johnson addresses his speech specifically to the COP26 World leaders and talks about having the duty to help to solve the problem about the climate crisis and to help to make a progress in next time for the future generations.
Boris Johnson has a specific picture of the climate crisis.
He thinks it is a big problem of the world and compares the rising temperature to the doomsday device.
He points out that in the last assemblies about the climate change the world did not really have made a progress except of the goal to stay under 1.5 degrees temperaturtemperature of the planet.
He points out that COP26 should be a turning point and that we have the technology and the possibility to finance to solve this problem.
He thinks specifically everybody on the COP26 conference can help by financing solutions for the climate crisis.
